divs: sighting detailswitness was outside on may 21, 2006 at 2:00p.m. from under the eaves he saw the silver shimmering craft in the east at 2,000 ft. it changed direction and went north, becoming fainter and fainter until he lost sight of it. witness also saw this craft on may 20, 2006 at 5,000 to 7,000 ft. at which time it went into a cloud at 45 degree angle and came out at right angles to itself. he tried to wave at the object to attract its attention. he saw the same object on may 3 at 6:30 p.m. it took 15 minutes to go 1\4 of the sky. on may 6 he saw the object near the airport. the bottom was raund & glistening. it drifted off to the east. on may 8 he saw it at 6:00 to 6:30 p.m. for about 10 minutes at 10,000 to 20,000 ft. and at about 30 degrees in the eastern sky as he was driving downtown. it was shining silver. on may 17th he again saw the object as he was driving over the edison bridge.
